name: Elegant Summer Dress
description: A beautiful flowing summer dress perfect for any occasion. Made with premium cotton blend for comfort and style. Features a flattering silhouette that works for both casual and formal events.

name: Classic White Shirt
description: Timeless white shirt that goes with everything. Professional and casual wear. Made from high-quality cotton with a comfortable fit.

name: Denim Jeans
description: Premium denim jeans with perfect fit and comfort. Available in multiple washes. Classic 5-pocket design with modern styling.

name: Casual T-Shirt
description: Comfortable cotton t-shirt for everyday wear. Soft and breathable fabric. Perfect for layering or wearing alone.

name: Men's Polo Shirt
description: Classic polo shirt for men. Perfect for casual and semi-formal occasions. Made with premium pique cotton.

name: Chino Pants
description: Versatile chino pants that work for both casual and business casual settings. Comfortable fit with modern styling.

name: Silk Scarf
description: Luxurious silk scarf with elegant patterns. Perfect accessory for any outfit. Adds sophistication to any look.

name: Floral Blouse
description: Beautiful floral blouse with delicate patterns. Perfect for spring and summer. Lightweight and comfortable fabric.
